ARABIC: فَٱنتَقَمْنَا مِنْهُمْ فَأَغْرَقْنَٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَكَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا غَٰفِلِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then We took revenge on them and drowned them in the sea because they denied Our Signs and paid no attention to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So We took vengeance on them, and drowned them in the sea for rejecting Our signs and not heeding them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So We inflicted Our retribution on them, and caused them to drown in the sea because they gave the lie to Our signs and were heedless of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We took revenge on them for their rejecting Our miracles, by drowning them in the sea, but they were not aware of (reality).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We therefore took revenge from them; so We drowned them in the sea for they used to deny Our signs and were ignoring them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So We took retribution from them. We drowned them in the sea, because they belied Our Ayat and were heedless with them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore We inflicted retribution on them and drowned them in the sea because they rejected Our signs and were heedless of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So We took vengeance on them, and drowned them in the sea, for that they cried lies to Our signs and heeded them not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Therefore We took retribution from them; therefore We drowned them in the sea: because they denied Our revelations and were heedless of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So We exacted retribution from them and drowned them in the sea, because they rejected Our signs and paid no heed to them;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore We took vengeance on them and drowned them in the sea, for they belied Our signs and were neglectful of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So We took vengeance on them and drowned them in the sea, for they denied Our signs and were oblivious to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So We exacted retribution from them: We drowned them in the sea, because they rejected Our Signs and failed to take warning from them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So We took retribution from them. We drowned them in the sea, because they belied Our Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.) and were heedless about them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So We punished them and drowned them in the sea, for they had belied Our signs and gave no heed to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So We took vengeance on them, and drowned them in the sea—because they rejected Our signs, and paid no heed to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So We took retribution from them, and We drowned them in the sea because they denied Our signs and were heedless of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:136] So We exacted retribution from them and therefore We drowned them in the sea (al-yamm denotes salty waters) for, the reason, that they denied Our signs and were heedless of them, not reflecting upon them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Therefore We took retribution from them) once and for all; (therefore We drowned them in the sea: because they denied Our) nine (revelations and were heedless of them) they were disbelievers in them.
